name: Entity 12
description:
IDEALLY PLAY IN FULLSCREEN (Unless your display isn't 16:9)
Also please turn on hardware acceleration in your browser if the game won't load

The dice bounces along the ground.... what will it bring your way this time?

-WASD to move, Space to jump

-Hold right click whilst near the dice to see the aiming trail, let go of RMB to throw it (throwing power increases with cursor distance from dice)

-Every time you roll the dice, it will cause a special effect

-Press R at any time to restart the level

Credits:

-Dannycopo, Programming & Game Design

-TepG, Music, SFX, Story and Art

-Ben1ny, Level Design
